profile:
Shower Restoration of Toronto is committed to delivering outstanding customer service. Not only does the owner meet directly with each client to provide a free estimate, but he also returns directly to the site to complete the work himself.

We're a small local family run business which began operations in the early 2000's in Toronto, Ontario where we completed extensive training in the marble restoration industry. Our first work experience was varied and included large scale commercial marble repairs. Our customers were so impressed with our service, that when it came time to refinish or restore their bathrooms, they naturally turned to us.

We pride ourselves in continuing to deliver outstanding results in shower renovations.

Providing exceptional customer service in our hallmark. We respond to every inquiry as though you are the only client.

profile:
* SEE IT FOR YOURSELF !!!

* Our service would give you full satisfaction in a matter of hours with very affordable prices !!!

* Who we are?

We are a professional cleaning company with high equipped tools that make your house and office look like new again.

* We Offer
- Carpet Cleaning Shampoo and Steam
- Odour and Stain removal of all kinds
- Fast Drying method
- Upholstery Deep cleaning
- Mattress Deep cleaning
- Tile & Grout cleaning

Why is Carpet Cleaning so important?

It helps to remove dust mites, bacteria and other allergens, which ultimately helps your family breathe easier and reduces the risk of colds and other health problems!

Why is Tile and Grout Cleaning important?

Because without regular professional cleaning, the grout in between tiles will start to look black and dirty. Not only does this look bad, but it can also harbor bacteria that could give off offensive odors or even make you sick.

* Contact us at any time at 647 654 7159 or 647 927 0950  

Also see our work on Instagram:

And on YouTube
